question: What was the main theme of the 23rd National Conference on e-Governance 2020?
option4: India 2020: Building of Skilling and Capacity
explanation: The 23rd National Conference on e-Governance 2020 was organized in Mumbai, Maharashtra. The main theme of the event was "India 2020: Digital Transformation". Six sub-theme of the event were "Digital Platforms and Digital Economy", "Improving Service Delivery", "Building Digital Trust- Transparency, Security and Privacy", "Digital Payments and Fintech", "National e-Governance Service Delivery Assessment (NeSDA) and Digital Service Standards (DSS)", "Skilling and Capacity Building".
